name: Gestore dei Mercati Energetici S.p.A.
goal:
In the REMIT framework GME:
- supports Italian Regulator (ARERA) under National Law 161/2014 in conducting investigations relating to cases of suspected violation of the prohibitions of insider trading and market manipulation, as well as in the event of failure to comply with the obligation to publish confidential information according to REMIT Regulation art.3, art.4 and art.5;
- acts as RRM on behalf of its market participants, by offering a comprehensive service of data reporting to Acer;
- offers a public market platform for the publication of inside information
euInitiatives: GME operates Italian power, gas and environmental markets and it has been nominated NEMO for the day ahead and intraday markets in Italy following the approval of the EU Regulation 1222/2015 (CACM). Thus GME is involved in EU activities related to the implementation of CACM regulation and furthermore in other projects aimed at achieving the integrated European electricity market.
